author: Jason Hubbard
comment: Really like the look and functionality. Only issue is I really really wish you could set weather location to zip code or city and not have to have GPS active for weather update

author: Luke Allard
comment: Overall looks good. Only complaint is that some of the complications (weather for example) display off centre, which detracts from the visual.

author: Edward Piekarski
comment: Works well, mostly. Compass stopped working and nothing I do restores it. Other apps from this developer are equally buggy.

author: Erick N
comment: Miss aligned Icons

author: MACO - MARIYAN-AN HAY DINH
comment: One of the best i ever used. Thanks, guys!

author: adrian pocock
comment: This is my favourite watch face atm. Using it with a Huawei W1 watch. Settings don't update straight away on the watch. Specifically when you press the change colour button on the watch face, you have to do something else (swipe left and right) on the watch before you see the change. This does however work if you have just selected this face but after a while it stops working.
title: Good, could be great.

author: Diego Camargo
comment: Amazing WatchFace, sometimes the settings seem to go unresponsive and you have to go to ambient then back to active for it to update. Would also love a flashlight shortcut   Keep up the good work

author: Justin Lang
comment: Good face for the price. When changing settings they don't update right away. Phone battery display is always slow to refresh making the option undesirable.

author: geri remy
comment: I really like that this watch face.  It has details I've been looking for but it drains my battery fast.  It makes it so I can't use it. Also the compass just doesn't work.
title: Drains my battery

author: Alberto Melis
comment: Please! Needs Google fit integration. Seems to be a stand alone step choice. Please add Google fit option. Txs

author: JaLayne Hawkins
comment: I asked the Creator to make the second hand stay on for a minute. I use this on my watch when I am working EMS. Thank you!!! Thank you!!!!
title: Displays for a Minute!!!!

author: Diogo Gomes
comment: On the LG Watch R the "Daily step counter" doesn't show up !?

author: Manu Joseph
comment: This is an awesome face... If only it synced Google Fit steps, wud have been a five star watch

author: K Ali
comment: If you love stylish watches , it's a must. Best watch face yet, I'm very happy.
title: Dinamic

author: Tangie Wright
comment: Doesn't update changes right away, if at all.

author: Ryan Ballard
comment: I really like how it looks, even after getting the 2.0 update on my Gen 1 Urbane!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

We already preparing update.

Regards

author: Tim Benson
comment: Still have messages indicated that will not clear

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, try to check archived messages.

author: Graham Garrett
comment: Nice but the compass does not work at all. Facing west and it says East.

author: Deddy H
comment: With 60s screen awake time, it is the best way to show off
title: Simply the best

author: Rayvel Jacas
comment: Really weel done.
title: Professional

author: Alexander Lazarev
comment: Very stylish sport looking watchface! Just one minor bug report: counter of missed calls and text messages won't reset, even after I checked messages on both phone and watches. Btw, if you could make small digital time a world time, where you can select different timezones, that would be very helpful. Overall great product!! Thank you!
title: Stylish!

author: Sam Tran
comment: I emailed the devs to report the compass not working on Huawei watch.   They responded the next day and fixed the compass with this latest build... All this happened in 6 days! I'm going to buy another one of their watch faces just because of this! Oh yeah,  and this watch face is awesome! Looks great,  highly functional,  and lots of options!
title: OMG

author: Paul Gardner
comment: I've tried just about every decent face out there, and I just keep coming back to this one. Nothing comes close to how good this one looks. I have it set up in a bright green. Looks great on both my LG Urbane and my TAG Connected.
title: It doesn't get better than this

author: Bill Sanders
comment: The compass is absolutely useless as it simply is not accurate. If I turn it off  I'd rather it disappear completely. ALSO changes I make in the app don't translate to the watch unless I switch watch faces. In addition the color tab doesn't work when I have it on the watch face. If these are fixed I could change to 5 stars. HAUWEI WATCH.
title: Its ok

author: Patrick Mehaffy
comment: The watch face is fantastic. The features are great, the customization is great. The only thing holding a 5 star rating back is how spartan the ambient mode is. It's either a digital watch face or its the full face in grayscale that's not saving much juice. Not a huge issue though, and it's worth the buy.
title: Great watch face except for ambient mode

author: Martin Gilbert
comment: The problem with this watch face is that now I have it no other will do, it's very customisable, the colours are vivid and stand out and I always come back to this one. I do however feel that the developer should apologise for the lack of sales to to other watch faces.
title: Awesome

author: William Cintron
comment: Step counter is not working properly.  Moto 360.  Now it's showing phone batt at 100%...not correct.
title: Nice but...

author: Mick Delaney
comment: I really like the design and its my favourite watch face. But the phone battery information does not update constantly and only shows correct percentage when I change to another watch face and then back again. Please fix and I will give 5 stars. The watch is Lg watch Urbane
title: Nice but....

author: Mo Alsharaf
comment: The step counter is not synching with Fit. Only if you set the watch face before walking then it begins counting at 0000.
title: STEP COUNTER Issue

author: David White
comment: Says it has stopwatch, yet I can't find how to activate it. Compass is not working either. Moto 360.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi David,

do you have latest version?
You can set indicator for stopwatch from configuration app.

Regards

title: Stopwatch?

author: Aleksander The Great
comment: Nuff said in title!
title: Great app drains battery though...

author: Bobby Elliott
comment: One log my favorite watch faces.
title: Good

author: Kevin Koperski
comment: The only thing that keeps me from making it my permanent default is the inability to get steps from Google Fit. Use Fit steps instead of generic step counter and this thing is almost perfect. Well done.
title: Great watch face

author: Anthony Yuen
comment: My watch is a Huawei Watch. The compass feature just not work.
title: Compass not work

author: Shawn Floyd
comment: Won't sync with google fit or would be perfect

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

It will be in next releases.

Kind regards

author: Steve Kendell
comment: But can't get the watch onto my desktop!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Steve,

It is watch face. It should be visible on your Android Wear watch. Please, read a description first.

Kind regards

title: Into settings....

author: Jeffrey Simon
comment: Very functional app. Shows the info I want.

author: mgates67
comment: Love the customability of this watch face, and it looks great too. There are two options that don't currently work, however. The "OK Google in center" and "Compass" check boxes don't have any effect on the display. I don't care about the OK Google since I don't want it cluttering up the display anyway, but the ability to disable the compass would be cool since I don't use it. If it worked and used the extra space to make the face slightly bigger, that would be awesome. Too bad it doesn't do anything.

author: David Murphy
comment: This is a nice face, but I have 2 issues with it. First, the compass doesn't work. What is it supposed to do? Should the dial rotate about the face as I turn, or should there be a ticker that moves about the dial? I don't know. Mine does nothing when I turn the compass on. The other issue is that only 1 background gives you the option of turning on the digits around the clock face. I want to see the numbers, so now I only have one usable background. The digits should be a separate setting. Fix for 5 stars.
title: Nice face, but...

author: Andrew Chesler
comment: I am glad there is a 25 second option , would like it to be 60 seconds for color, but the only complaint is my gen 2 moto360 will not produce a working compass with your watch face?

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Andrew,

Please, try to restart the watch or calibrate the compass.

Regards

title: Great look and powerful controls
